assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.

group.label: Ethics approval and consent to participate
group.name: EthicsHeading

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: According to approved protocols of each referring clinical center, written informed consent was obtained from the probands or their legal representatives for specimen collection and genetic analysis. All individuals recruited provided informed consent for their participation in the study and publication of relevant findings.
